name: Men's Timex Vancouver Whitecaps FC Gamer Watch
shortDescription: You've been looking for a watch that will show you the time and highlight your loyalty to the Vancouver Whitecaps FC. You're in luck, because this Timex Vancouver Whitecaps FC Gamer watch will help you do both easily. It features stunning Vancouver Whitecaps FC graphics and is water resistant up to 50 meters, so don't be afraid to jump in the pool or go to the beach with it on.
longDescription:
You've been looking for a watch that will show you the time and highlight your loyalty to the Vancouver Whitecaps FC. You're in luck, because this Timex Vancouver Whitecaps FC Gamer watch will help you do both easily. It features stunning Vancouver Whitecaps FC graphics and is water resistant up to 50 meters, so don't be afraid to jump in the pool or go to the beach with it on.


PRODUCT FEATURES

  • Imported
  • Officially licensed
  • Enamel Top-Ring and Crown Protectors
  • Quartz analog movement
  • Water Resistant to 50 Meters
  • Printed graphics
  • Buckle closure
  • Up to 10-Year Battery
  • Brand: Timex
  • Team color second hand
  • Material: 100% Stainless Steel - Body; 100% Glass - Face; 100% Silicone - Straps
  • Scratch Resistant Mineral Glass
  • QuickDate Feature

Due to its contents, this product cannot be shipped via our Priority Service or sent to Alaska, Hawaii, P.O. boxes, and/or APO/FPO military addresses.
